original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality is due to the purity of perception.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects, the purity of perception, and the purity of the perfection of morality are not two and are not sundered.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not sundered, and not divided.

translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the sense-field of mental objects and the purity of the perfection of giving are not two,

original: de ltar na 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, past purity and future and present purity are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and not interrupted.

original: ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: “The future is pure because the past and the present are pure.

original: de ltar na ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, future purity and past and present purity are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and not interrupted.

original: da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the present is the purity of the past and the future.

original: de ltar na da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the present and the purity of the past and the future are non-dual and not discriminated.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of the infinite.🔽The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of the unrejectable.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of the intrinsic nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang @174a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang @174a *//
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existent things.

original: ba'o // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: ba'o // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the applications of mindfulness.🔽The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽dbang po rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // dbang po rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the bases of supernatural powers.🔽The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the faculties.

original: stobs rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because the branches of enlightenment are pure.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because the noble eightfold path is pure.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: it is the light of purity because the four noble truths are pure.

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽tshad med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // tshad med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because the meditative concentrations are pure.🔽It is the light of purity because the immeasurable aspirations are pure.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because the formless absorptions are pure.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because the eight aspects of liberation are pure.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are pure.

original: stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because emptiness is pure.

original: mtshan ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because signlessness is pure.

original: smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because wishlessness is pure.

original: mngon par @174b shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par @174b shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because the superknowledges are pure.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because meditative absorption is pure.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because the dhāraṇī gateways are pure.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because the ten powers of the tathāgatas are pure.🔽It is the appearance of purity because the four fearlessnesses are pure.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of purity because the four detailed and thorough knowledges are pure.

original: snying rje chen po rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because of the purity of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because of the purity of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because of the purity of the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //

original: dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because of the purity of the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of purity because of the purity of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //

original: 'du byed la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o; ;rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

translated: Consciousness is pure, since it is without transference or reunion.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: mig la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // rna ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // sna la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: the eyes are pure, since they are without transference or reunion.🔽The ears are pure, since they are without transference or reunion.🔽The nose is pure, since it is without transference or reunion.

original: lce la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The tongue is pure, since it is without transference or reunion.

original: lus la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lus la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The body is pure, since it is without transference or reunion.

original: yid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The mind is pure, since it is without transference or reunion.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: form, without transference and without joining, is pure.

original: sgra la 'pho ba med cing nying gi @175b mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽dri la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽ro la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sgra la 'pho ba med cing nying gi @175b mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // dri la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // ro la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Sound, without transference and without joining, is pure.🔽Smell, without transference and without joining, is pure.🔽Taste, without transference and without joining, is pure.

original: reg la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: reg la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Tactile objects, without transference and without joining, are pure.

original: chos la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Mental phenomena, without transference and without joining, are pure.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: eye consciousness, without transference and without joining, is pure.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The ear consciousness is pure, without transference or interruption.🔽The nose consciousness is pure, without transference or interruption.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The tongue consciousness is pure, without transference or interruption.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The body consciousness is pure, without transference or interruption.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The mind consciousness is pure, without transference or interruption.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: eye contact is pure, without transference or interruption.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The contact that occurs through the union of ear and sound, and the contact that occurs through the union of nose and smell, and the contact that occurs through the union of tongue and taste, and the contact that occurs through the union of body and touch, and the contact that occurs through the union of mind and mental phenomena are pure, Śāriputra, because they are without transference or interruption.🔽The contact that occurs through the union of eye and form is pure, Śāriputra, because it is without transference or interruption.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams @176a *//
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams @176a *//
translated: The contact that occurs through the union of ear and sound, and the contact that occurs through the union of nose and smell, and the contact that occurs through the union of tongue and taste, and the contact that occurs through the union of body and touch, and the contact that occurs through the union of mind and mental phenomena are pure, Śāriputra, because they are without transference or interruption.

original: sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The sensation that arises from the condition of eye contact is pure, Śāriputra, because it is without transference or interruption.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The sensation that arises from the condition of ear contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of nose contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of tongue contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of body contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of mind contact are pure, Śāriputra, because they are without transference or interruption.🔽The sensation that arises from the condition of eye contact is pure, Śāriputra, because it is without transference or interruption.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The sensation that arises from the condition of ear contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of nose contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of tongue contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of body contact, and the sensation that arises from the condition of mind contact are pure, Śāriputra, because they are without transference or interruption.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the ear is pure, being without transference and without joining.🔽The condition of contact through the coming together of the nose is pure, being without transference and without joining.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue is pure, being without transference and without joining.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the body is pure, being without transference and without joining.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the mind is pure, being without transference and without joining.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: sa'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The earth element, without transference and without connection, is pure.

original: chu'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The water element, without transference and without connection, is pure.

original: me'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽@176b rlung gi khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // @176b rlung gi khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The fire element, without transference and without connection, is pure.🔽The wind element, without transference and without connection, is pure.

original: nam mkha'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The space element, without transference and without connection, is pure.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The consciousness element, without transference and without connection, is pure.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: ma rig pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: ignorance, without transference and without connection, is pure.

original: 'du byed la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The formation of volitions is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.🔽Consciousness is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.

original: rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o; ;ming dang gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o; ;ming dang gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Name-and-form is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.

original: skye mched drug la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The six sense spheres are pure, in that they neither pass on nor link up.

original: reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Contact is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.

original: tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽sred pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // sred pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Sensation is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.🔽Craving is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.

original: len pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: len pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Clinging is pure, in that it neither passes on nor links up.

original: srid pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Non-transference and non-linking in becoming is purification.

original: skye ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Non-transference and non-linking in birth is purification.

original: rga shi la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Non-transference and non-linking in old age and death is purification.

original: @177a *// sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: @177a *// sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: non-transference and non-linking in the perfection of generosity is purification.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Non-transference and non-linking in the perfection of discipline is purification.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Non-transference and non-linking in the perfection of patience is purification.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is pure because it is without transition or interruption.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is pure because it is without transition or interruption.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because it is without transition or interruption.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽phyi stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / nang stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // phyi stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Śāriputra,🔽inner emptiness is pure because it is without transition or interruption.🔽Outer emptiness is pure because it is without transition or interruption.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is pure because it is without transition or interruption.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽chen po stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // chen po stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is without transference or connection and is pure.🔽The emptiness of the great is without transference or connection and is pure.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams @177b sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams @177b sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is without transference or connection and is pure.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is without transference or connection and is pure.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is without transference or connection and is pure.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is without transference or connection and is pure.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness that is neither diminished nor increased is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa 'di la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa 'di la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness that is not rejected is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonapprehension is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is pure, being without transition or interruption.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams @178a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o // yang dag par spong ba la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams @178a *//
translated: the applications of mindfulness are pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are pure, being without transition or interruption.

original: dbang po la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The faculties are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: stobs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: stobs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The powers are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The branches of awakening are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The noble truths are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: bsam gtan la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The meditative concentrations are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: tshad med pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The immeasurable aspirations are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'pho ba med cing //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'pho ba med cing //
translated: The formless absorptions are without transference and without connection.

original: nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is complete purity.🔽The eight liberations are without transference and without connection.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is complete purity.🔽The nine serial absorptions are without transference and without connection.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is complete purity.🔽Emptiness is without transference and without connection.

original: stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is complete purity.

original: mtshan ma med pa la 'pho ba med cing @178b nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la 'pho ba med cing @178b nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Signlessness is without transference and without connection.🔽That is complete purity.🔽Wishlessness is without transference and without connection.

original: smon pa med pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is complete purity.

original: mngon par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The superknowledges are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: ting nge 'dzin la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Samādhi is pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: gzungs kyi sgo la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The four fearlessnesses are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: byams pa chen po la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Great love is pure in being without transference or interruption.

original: snying rje chen po la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: @179a *// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: rang byang chub la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //

translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //

translated: Because the six sense sources are naturally luminous, they are pure and non-afflictive.🔽Because contact is naturally luminous, it is pure and non-afflictive.
